Redwind is a named orc (NPC), located at the orc temple in the Everfrost Peaks.
Redwind is a Shadowknight so expect a nasty Harm Touch when pulling him. Also Redwind is always guarded by an escort. However Redwind can be pulled without training the other orcs protecting him by using Harmony. Redwind drops the bottom of the rune of Ivy, that rangers need for their Etched Ivy Bracers.
